briefTitle: Therapy of Complicated Intra-Abdominal Infections With Moxifloxacin or Ertapenem
officialTitle: A Prospective, Randomized, Double-dummy, Double-blind, Multicenter Trial Comparing the Safety and Efficacy of Intravenous Moxifloxacin 400 mg IV QD 24 Hours to That of Ertapenem 1.0 g IV QD 24 Hours for 5 to 14 Days for the Treatment of Subjects With Complicated Intra-abdominal Infections (PROMISE Study)
summary: A study to compare the safety and efficacy of moxifloxacin to ertapenem in patients with intra-abdominal infections.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Achieving Clinical Cure at Test of Cure (TOC) Visit in the Per Protocol Population
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 21 to 28 days after completion of study drug therapy
